pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

meanings: winner (of the most rounds, i.e. a full game)

lessons.japanese: 理論をより詳しく吟味する前に、いくつかの指摘をしておきたい。
lessons.english: I would like to make a few remarks before turning to a close examination of the theory.

lessons.japanese: 社の弁護士に暫定合意の内容を吟味してもらおう。
lessons.english: We'll have our firm's attorneys look through the provisional agreement.

lessons.japanese: 最初に、この実験で使用された触媒について吟味したい。
lessons.english: As a beginning I would like to examine the catalyzer used in this experiment.

lessons.japanese: 最初に、この実験で使用された触媒について吟味したい。
lessons.english: First, I'd like to examine the catalyst used in this experiment.

lessons.japanese: 最初に、この実験で使用された触媒について吟味したい。
lessons.english: As a beginning I would like to examine the catalyzer used in this experiment.

lessons.japanese: 社の弁護士に暫定合意の内容を吟味してもらおう。
lessons.english: We'll have our firm's attorneys look through the provisional agreement.

lessons.japanese: 理論をより詳しく吟味する前に、いくつかの指摘をしておきたい。
lessons.english: I would like to make a few remarks before turning to a close examination of the theory.

lessons.japanese: 最初に、この実験で使用された触媒について吟味したい。
lessons.english: First, I'd like to examine the catalyst used in this experiment.

lessons.japanese: モノを買う時は、よく吟味してから買いなさい。
lessons.english: When you buy something, examine it carefully before you buy it.

lessons.japanese: モノを買う時は、よく吟味してから買いなさい。
lessons.english: When you buy something, examine it carefully before you buy it.
